Package com.service

Interface CustomerDAOI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDAO
    public interface CustomerDAOI
    This is a DAO interface to implements CRUD operations for objects of Customer class
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Victor Zenin
    See Also:
    BankDAOI, AccountDAOI, PaymentDAOI, BankDAO, CustomerDAO, PaymentDAO, AccountDAO

      • selectCustomers

        java.util.List<Customer> selectCustomers​(java.lang.String sql)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get a list of existing customers from the application
        Parameters:
        sql - JPQL query
        Returns:
        list of customers
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

                                         java.lang.String username)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get a list of existing customers from the application
        Parameters:
        sql - JPQL query
        username - login of customer
        Returns:
        list of customers
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

      • createCustomer

        void createCustomer​(Customer newCustomer)
             throws CreateCustomerException,
                    java.sql.SQLException
        Add a new customer to the application
        Parameters:
        newCustomer - an object, instance of Customer
        Throws:
        CreateCustomerException - if the system cannot create the new user. An user exists already with the same login
        java.sql.SQLException - if JPQL query was executed with an error

        Parameters:
